body:
Ah okay I know why the build's failing. We had a hacky `skipIfLapack` rule that checks the error message but this isn't fitting the pattern. LOL

Can you make this throw `gesv : Lapack library not found in compile time` instead? Would be great to change the one above too. Thanks! :) I'll add a proper flag for LAPACK later.
